title: Our Purpose & Direction
subtitle: Discover our vision, mission, and the core values that drive our media club forward

missions.title: Our Vision
missions.description: To become the leading platform for student media innovation and creativity at the University Center of Naama and beyond

missions.title: Our Mission
missions.description: Empowering students at the University Center of Naama to excel in digital media and storytelling through hands-on experience and collaborative projects

missions.title: Our Values
missions.description: Fostering collaboration, creativity, and professional growth in media production while serving our university community

content: Rising Media Club was established at the University Center of Naama as a specialized media club dedicated to providing students with practical skills and experience in all forms of media production.
coreObjectives: Mission and vision defined in 3 core objectives
